description: Classic tiramisu cake with mascarpone cream, espresso-soaked ladyfingers, and cocoa dusting.

instructions.description: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold mascarpone into the yolk mixture until smooth.
Quickly dip each ladyfinger in cooled espresso and arrange a layer in the dish.
Spread half of the mascarpone cream over the first ladyfinger layer.
Repeat with a second dipped ladyfinger layer and remaining cream.
Refrigerate for at least 6 hours, then dust generously with cocoa powder before serving.
